item.title: First
item.description: This is the first short story. Let’s see if this works out! Also, if possible, let’s try to add a featured image next.

item.title: Book notes -- American Kingpin
item.description: What if truth is better than fiction? Mark Twain famously quoted — Truth is stranger than fiction, but it is because fiction is obliged to stick to possibilities, truth isn’t. In other words, fiction has to always make sense, but truth doesn’t. This is one of the biggest paradoxes in life. When we create stories, they have to be logical, otherwise, they don’t stick very well. But the truth is usually a series of random events.
